author: Shiv Sunny
text:
Frustrated over not being allowed to approach Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s convoy, a 20-year-old woman went on a rampage as she pushed away police barricades and broke a flowerpot on Wednesday.

The Ghaziabad woman, Neena Rawal, told interrogators that she wanted to complain to the PM about some men tearing her marks-sheet.

The initial probe revealed her allegations to be unfounded.

A senior police officer said a medical examination revealed she had schizophrenia. The police decided not to lodge a FIR.
title: Woman creates security scare on PM’s route
